properties.verseOrder: c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1.Mbingu zifurahi na dunia ishangilie
furahini shangilieni aleluya

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2.Mbingu hutangaza haki yake bwana
furahini shangilieni aleluya

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3.Mataifa yataona utukufu wake Bwana
furahini shangilieni aleluya

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
4.Umetukuka eeBwana juu ya dunia yote
furahini shangilieni aleluya

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
5.Kiti chako ni imara wewe upo tangu milele
furahini shangilieni aleluya
